messages.content: You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
What are your business hours?
Our business hours are Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
How do I reset my password?
To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
Where is your company located?
We are headquartered in San Francisco, California, with offices in New York and Austin.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
Do you offer refunds?
Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all our products. Contact support@company.com to initiate a refund.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
How can I contact support?
You can reach our support team via email at support@company.com or call us at 1-800-TECH-HELP during business hours.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
What payment methods do you accept?
We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and wire transfers for enterprise customers.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
Do you have a mobile app?
Yes! Our mobile app is available for both iOS and Android. You can download it from the App Store or Google Play Store.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
How long does shipping take?
Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. We also offer expedited shipping (2-3 days) and overnight delivery for an additional fee.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
Can I upgrade my plan?
Absolutely! You can upgrade your plan anytime from your account dashboard. The changes will take effect immediately, and you'll be prorated for the current billing period.
You are a helpful assistant for a tech company.
Is there a free trial available?
Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start your trial.
